item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
A giant mummy is a dead giant brought back from the dead with the dark Ritual of Rebirth. The dried and leathery body is stronger than it was in life and retains all of its magical powers. The mummy is constantly surrounded by a horrible Wind of Leprosy.
